                                      IOException,
                                      NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                      CertificateException,
                                      KeyStoreException
Method for the encryption of a SOAP message.

Parameters:
_soapMessage - The message to encrypt.
_encryptionParts - The parts of the message that should be encrypted.
_keystore - A JKS Keystore that includes the public key that is needed for the encryption.
_alias - The alias of the receiver.
Throws:
SOAPException
org.apache.ws.security.components.crypto.CredentialException
IOException

signSOAPMessage

public static void signSOAPMessage(SOAPMessage _soapMessage,
                                   Vector<org.apache.ws.security.WSEncryptionPart> _signingParts,
                                   String _pkcs12File,
                                   String _alias,
                                   String _password)
                            throws SOAPException,
                                   org.apache.ws.security.components.crypto.CredentialException,
                                   IOException
Method for the signing of a SOAP message.

Parameters:
_soapMessage - The message to sign.
_signingParts - The parts of the message that should be signed.
_pkcs12File - The file path to a p12 of the agent that signs the message.
_alias - The alias of the agent.
_password - The password to be able to access the private key.
Throws:
SOAPException
org.apache.ws.security.components.crypto.CredentialException
IOException
